37II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'08'31 37
wxl 2"109 - 2019 fmnrjdß ui 01 jeks isl=rdod - 2019'02'01
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 38
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
37 - B 081491 — 353 (2019/02)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 fmnrjdß ui 22 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2019 fmnrjdß ui 08 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'02'01
38  
.ïfmd< Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
1984 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1984 wxl 12 
ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg 
udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
   Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wÞ, f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka 
úiska ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr tA i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o lsishï kvq jd¾;djla 
úkdY fkdl< hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla bl=;a 
ùug fmr ;ud úiska kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd 
l< hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
 Y%sks;a úfÊfialr"
 Èia;%sla úksYaphldr"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'02'01

foam< msysàu'- fuu bvu ud<fò k.rfha isg f.dv.u mdr ^w;=re.sßh mdr& Tiafia ls' ó' 1'15 muK .uka lrk úg 
fuu foam< yuqfõ'
f.ùfï l%uh'- fjkafoaish wjika jQ jydu id¾:l .eKqïlre úiska  ^i& .eKqï ñf,ka ishhg oyhla ^10]& la o ^ii& 
isú,a kvq úOdk ix.%yfha wxl 258 j.ka;sh ^w& hgf;a whlsÍï o" ^iii& úl=Kqï i|yd jk ish¨u úhoï uqo,ska f.úh hq;=h' 
.eKqï ñf,ka b;sß ishhg ye;a;Emy ^75]& la jQ uqo, úl=Kqï Èk isg Èk ;syla ^30& we;=<; tlS kvqfõ nerg wêlrKfha

Wmf,aLkh
niakdysr m<df;a" fld<U Èia;%slalfha" fyajd.ï fldarf,a" m,af,a m;a;=fõ" lvqfj, k.r iNd iSudj ;=< msysá lvqfj, 
m<d;a f,alï fldÜGdihg wh;a" wxl 476B" ud<fò" W;=r .%du ks,Odß jifuys ud<fò .fuys msysá zz.,afmd;a;j;a; 
fyj;a me,eka.yj;a;ZZ keue;s bvfï wjir,;a ñkskafodare ã' à' tA' Èidkdhl uy;d úiska j¾I 2005'05'18 jk Èk § uek 
iEÿ wxl 2296 ork msUqfrys ksrEms; len,s wxl zz01ZZ udhsï (

msysá rEâ 02 m¾pia ody;rhs oYu ;=kla ^w' 0" rE' 2" m¾' 14'3& úYd, ìï m%udKh iy tA ;=< msysá iEu ish¨ foao fõ' fuu

uOHu m<df;a uykqjr Èia;%slalfha" idrish m;a;=fõ l=¿.ïuk ishm;a;=fõ ydßiam;a;=j m%dfoaYSh f,alï fldÜGdifha

weialSis wxlh ( 232$18

fld<U 02" hQkshka fmfoi" 200" ys,agka l,ïnq frisvkaia ldur wxl 705 ys iajlSh ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h mj;ajdf.k 
hk ialEka bkaðhkshßx ^m%hsjÜ& ,sñgâ Scan Engineering (Private) Limited  ^PV14149& iud.u .Kka fírd jid±óu 
i|yd 2018 foieïn¾ ui 10 Èk ork fm;aiula isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lrñka fld<U § mj;ajkq ,nk niakdysr 
m<d;ano uydêlrKhg bÈßm;a fldg we;s nj;a" tlS fm;aiu ms<sn| úuiSu 2019 fmnrjdß ui 14 jk Èkg kshu lr 
we;s nj;a" tlS fm;aiu iïnkaOj ksfhda.hla lsÍu iïnkaOfhka mdlaIslj fyda úreoaOj lreKq ±laùug woyia lrk 
tu iud.fï ljr fyda Kh ysñfhl=g fyda odhlfhl=g ;u woyi fjkqfjka tlS úuiSu lrk wjia:dfõ § fm!oa.,slj 
fyda f,aLK.; kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska fmkS isg lreKq ±laúh yels nj;a" fm;aifï msgm;la kshñ; .dia;= f.ùu u; tys 
ljr fyda Khysñfhl=g fyda odhlfhl=g my; w;aika lrk kS;s{ ;ekf.ka b,a,d isá úg ,nd .; yels nj;a fuhska

.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys 
,eîug iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  .eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg 
o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'
